title: Sell Bardstown Bourbon Company
metaTitle: Sell Bardstown Bourbon Company | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Bardstown Bourbon Company Discovery, Collaborative, and Ferrand releases. We buy rare Bardstown bottles. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Bardstown Discovery Series and Collaborative Series releases.
introParagraph: Bardstown Bourbon Company is known for blending high-quality vintage stocks and unique collaborative finishes. We purchase the Discovery Series (especially early batches like #1 and #2), the Collaborative Series (Ferrand, Prisoner, etc.), and other limited runs. Get a direct offer for your bottles today.
whatWeBuy: Bardstown Collaborative Series (Ferrand, Prisoner, Founders KBS, etc.)
whatWeDoNotBuy: Recent Fusion Series (unless part of collection)
photoChecklist: Front label showing Series and Batch number
conditionFactors: Batch number is critical for Discovery Series value
pricingFactors: Batch number (Discovery Series #1 and #2 are most valuable)
Collaborative partner (highly rated finishes like Chateau de Laubade command premiums)

faqs.question: Which Discovery Series batch is worth the most?
faqs.answer: Discovery Series #1 and #2 rely on older sourced KY bourbon and typically command the highest prices.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Fusion Series?
faqs.answer: We buy early Fusion Series batches (like #1), but recent batches are generally not purchased individually.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Collaborative Series finished in wine casks?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy the Prisoner, Phifer Pavitt, and Ferrand finishes, among others.

faqs.question: Do I need the box?
faqs.answer: Most Bardstown releases do not come in boxes, so the bottle condition is the main factor.

faqs.question: Do you buy Bardstown Origin Series?
faqs.answer: Generally, we do not buy the standard Origin Series bottles unless they are special limited releases.

faqs.question: How quickly do you pay?
faqs.answer: Payment is issued within 24 hours of receiving and verifying your shipment.
